landing_faq1_a: Yes, 100%. Every video on our platform is created using artificial intelligence. No real human beings are depicted in any content. This is strictly synthetic/fictional material.
landing_faq2_a: We use NOWPayments gateway. When you subscribe, you'll be redirected to a secure checkout page where you can pay with Bitcoin, Ethereum, USDT, or 200+ other cryptocurrencies. Your subscription activates automatically after payment confirmation.
landing_faq3_a: Yes! We offer a selection of free videos available to all registered users. Premium content requires an active subscription (Basic $9.99/mo or Premium $19.99/mo).
landing_faq4_a: Absolutely. We use crypto payments for anonymity, signed URLs for video delivery, HTTPS encryption, and minimal data collection. We don't sell or share your information.
